FuncDef: The reset aaa-proxy statistics command clears statistics about AAA proxy. The reset aaa-proxy statistics command clears statistics about AAA proxy.
CLIs: reset aaa-proxy statistics { error | message | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics of AAA proxy errors.
-

Clears statistics of AAA proxy messages.
-

Clears statistics of AAA proxy errors and messages.
-
